nodes.bodyText:
This should be quoted and have a space before "${ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS}"

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              ALLUXIO_FUSE_JAVA_OPTS+=${ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS}
          
          
            
               ALLUXIO_FUSE_JAVA_OPTS+=" ${ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS}"
It is simpler to say AlluxioFuse is not running
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -109,7 +109,8 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
   local fuse_info=$("${jps}" | grep AlluxioFuse)
   if [[ -z ${fuse_info} ]]; then
-    echo "AlluxioFuse: not running"
+    echo "No running AlluxioFuse process is found."

@@ -109,7 +109,8 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
   local fuse_info=$("${jps}" | grep AlluxioFuse)
   if [[ -z ${fuse_info} ]]; then
-    echo "AlluxioFuse: not running"
+    echo "No running AlluxioFuse process is found."

nodes.bodyText: "dismount" is not really a good  word to use in this context. Just say unmount
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -118,7 +119,19 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
 }
 
-USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]"
+USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]
+
+mount \tmount an Alluxio path to local file system
+umount \tdismount an Alluxio path from local file system

@@ -118,7 +119,19 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
 }
 
-USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]"
+USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]
+
+mount \tmount an Alluxio path to local file system
+umount \tdismount an Alluxio path from local file system

nodes.bodyText: I think adding the tab in Usage: \t... is unnecessary. The usage statement isn't in a table format. It will also probably be better for line length to just use a single space. Either that or use \n\t. It seems to be the format of most GNU coreutils (cp, rm, mv, mount, etc..)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -118,7 +119,19 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
 }
 
-USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]"
+USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]
+
+mount \tmount an Alluxio path to local file system
+umount \tdismount an Alluxio path from local file system
+stat \tshow status of Alluxio mount points
+"
+
+MOUNT_USAGE="Usage: \talluxio-fuse mount [-n] [-o <mount option>] <mount_point> [alluxio_path]

@@ -118,7 +119,19 @@ fuse_stat() {
   fi
 }
 
-USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]"
+USAGE_MSG="Usage:\n\talluxio-fuse [mount|umount|stat]
+
+mount \tmount an Alluxio path to local file system
+umount \tdismount an Alluxio path from local file system
+stat \tshow status of Alluxio mount points
+"
+
+MOUNT_USAGE="Usage: \talluxio-fuse mount [-n] [-o <mount option>] <mount_point> [alluxio_path]
